thread.section_title: eSURRANTY.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of eSURRANTY.com | esurranty.com
thread.title: Seth Greenbaum

author: Seth Greenbaum
title: Seth Greenbaum
text: After being a customer for 2 years I had to file a claim for my new iPhone 7 Plus. The glass on the back of the camera cracked and when I took it to Apple they told me I had to replace the whole phone because that wasn't covered. I called esurranty and they told me they would take care of it. I filed a claim, submitted the document online and they set up the replacement for me at the same apple store. Only this time, I paid $79.00! Esurranty is a life saver and I have and will continue to recommend them to everyone.
